name: cfxacharya
title: cfxacharya
description: Closes the tabs on a set interval except one. redirects that one to a specified address.
author: victortheleon@gmail.com

preferences.description: How many seconds to repeat the incident.
preferences.name: repeatInterval
preferences.title: Repeat Interval( in seconds )

preferences.description: Does it need to turn full screen on?
preferences.name: doFullScreen
preferences.title: Should it turn browser to full screen?
